enter_macro_hint: Enter the name of the macros (as in the application) and click "Execute"
websocket_not_ready: WebSocket is not established yet — try again in a second
nothing_saved: Nothing saved yet. Press "+" to add.
step_on: Click ON next to “Wireless Control” in the xlmacros app.
step_socket: The app opens a WebSocket connection to our server.
step_use: After that, you can use the functions on this page.
step_if_not: If something doesn’t work, try refreshing the page or contact us.
step_note: Note:  we are not responsible for safeguarding your password, cookies, or browser data.
